Speech Master About Exit Beginner Intermediate Advanced
Master English Pronunciation Say something.
Sorry! Your device doesn\'t support speech input.
More Press speak and say this... Sounds like you said...
Hello. My name is ... How are you? Do you speak ...? I don\'t speak English. Thank you. You\'re welcome. I come from ...
Where can I find the bank? Do you know where the bathroom is? Where is the supermarket? Can you tell me where the bus stop is? I don\'t really speak a lot of English. Thank you for your time.111 It\'s been my pleasure. That\'s all for now. Thank you.
This should be a fairly advanced sentence. What time does the train arrive at the station? Is there any place we can get a bit to eat? As far as I know, there aren\'t any good restaurants around here. I can speak English without many problems. Where should we look for our classmates later? Never mind. We\'re just trying to find our friends for dinner. There are a lot of things we can do. What do you suggest?
